synopsis: Tenchi thinks back to the strange occurrences in his life that have led him to this point, Ryo-Ohki gets lost in the wilderness, and the Masaki household encounters and unexpected visitor!
Tenchi's sister reveals some startling news: Tenchi has a new fiancee! How will Ryoko and the rest of the girls react!?
When stress leaves Tenchi confined to his bed, his new fiancee attempts to nurse him back to health! Meanwhile, Mihoshi makes plans to return home!
Mihoshi's brother vows to kill Tenchi for making his beloved sister part of a harem, and the housemates prepare a special meal for the arrival of Lady Seto!
While Ryoko and Ryo-Ohki do battle against the Chobimaru, Mashisu must turn her attention the strong feelings she has for Misao!
Tenchi and Z meet in an intergalactic battle for the ages. When Tsunami and Washu get involved, the conflict threatens to destroy the entire universe!
